reviewText: Great Old Time movie wonderful to watch
not what i thought for $20 and NO WHERE WAS IT MARKED IN FRENCH PACKAGING AND ALL

The impendingly vertiginous pace of the editing plus the exceptionally inventive special effects make this film a delight to watch. In addition the audience can't help but feel profound identification with the trials and travails of our deeply scarred but ultimately victorious scanner. A deeply redemptive movie.

The best movie out of the scanner series. The special effects finally got good enough. Still B movie graphics, but the plot makes up for it. Worth a look for Friday night B movie lovers. Great action and is part of the first series that really explores telekinesis.
I love it just like 2,3 it is great and I think they should of made more scanners movies in the seares
